title: Disable site visit history from new tab Shortcuts

Is this possible?

creator: h00k1t

title: importing bookmarks empties folders I have created
content:
I do not use the sync function to keep my bookmarks up to date on separate computers. I have a location on a server that I can access from any of my machines. Usually I import and export to html bookmark file.

I have organized my bookmarks into various folders. When I attempted to update one of my boxes, all the bookmarks were removed from the folders and placed in a huge list in Other Bookmarks. The folder structure did not change, but all the folders were empty.

I tried to use a json file as an alternative, but this also had the same result.

I run Debian Linux on all my machines, if that matters.

What could be the problem?

Thanks in advance.
creator: Scottzzz

title: Pin header at top of page
content: How do I pin the header at the top of the window? It all of a sudden went into hide mode, only showing up if I mouse over it, then it makes the screen content jump down. Very annoying. I must have hit a key code I don't know or they updated or something...

title: non-responding website
content:
I am trying to login to a bank website. Before the latest update, this was no problem. Now the website just sits there and nothing is happening. When I use the same login on Safari, the website responds.

I am using an iMac running 10.13 OS. My FF is updated to 89.0.2.

Please respond ASAP, as I need to be able to get into the account fairly regularly.

Pat N.
